text: Mae Margaret Whitman (born June 9, 1988) is an American television, movie and voice actor. ==Filmography== Year Film 1994 When a Man Loves a Woman 1995 Bye Bye Love 1995 Degree of Guilt 1995 Naomi & Wynonna: Love Can Build a Bridge 1996 After Jimmy 1996 Duckman: Private Dick/Family Man 1996 Independence Day 1996 Early Edition 1996 Friends 1996 One Fine Day 1996 The Cartoon Cartoon Show 1996-1999 Chicago Hope 1997 Superman: The Animated Series 1997 Merry Christmas, George Bailey 1997-2004 Johnny Bravo 1998 The Gingerbread Man 1998 Hope Floats 1998-2001 JAG 1999 Judging Amy 1999 Providence 1999 Hallmark Hall of Fame 1999 Jingle Bells 1999 Invisible Child 1999 Mickey's Once Upon a Christmas 2000 Teacher's Pet 2000 The Wild Thornberrys 2001 An American Rhapsody 2001 Max Steel 2001 Jackie Chan Adventures 2001-2002 State of Grace 2002 The Wild Thornberrys Movie 2002 Presidio Med 2002 The Zeta Project 2002-2004 Fillmore! 2003 The Jungle Book 2 2004 Teacher's Pet 2004 Cold Case 2004 EverQuest II 2004 CSI: Crime Scene Investigation 2004 Century City 2004-2006 Arrested Development 2005 Going Shopping 2005 The Happy Elf 2005 Kingdom Hearts II 2005-2007 American Dragon: Jake Long 2005-2008 Avatar: The Last Airbender 2006 The Bondage 2006 Cartoon Network Racing 2006 Dirge of Cerberus: Final Fantasy VII 2006 Thief 2006 Love's Abiding Joy 2006 Avatar: The Last Airbender 2006 Desperate Housewives 2006 Phil of the Future 2006 Jesse Stone: Death in Paradise 2007 Grey's Anatomy 2007 Lost in the Dark 2007 Bionic Woman 2007 The Legend of Spyro: The Eternal Night 2007 Boogeyman 2 2007 Ghost Whisperer 2007 ER 2007 Justice 2008 Law & Order: Special Victims Unit 2008 Tinker Bell 2008 Nights in Rodanthe 2008 Good Behavior 2008-2009 In Treatment 2008-Present Family Guy 2009 Spring Breakdown 2009 Acceptance 2009 Criminal Minds 2009 Tinker Bell and the Lost Treasure 2009-Present The Cleveland Show 2010 Parenthood 2010 Barry Munday 2010 Firedog 2010 Kingdom Hearts: Birth by Sleep 2010 Scott Pilgrim vs. the World 2010 Scott Pilgrim vs. the Animation 2010 Tinker Bell and the Great Fairy Rescue 2010 Jesse Stone: No Remorse 2011 Tinker Bell: A Winter Story 2011 The Factory ==Music== Whitman has recorded "I Heard The Bells On Christmas Day" and "You Make Christmas Feel So Good" for School's Out! Christmas. Whitmans has also sang guest vocals on a number of tracks from indie-punk band Fake Problems newest album Real Ghosts Caught on Tape. ==Personal life== On August 16, 2021, Whitman came out as pansexual. She announced this after the episode "Knock, Knock, Knocking on Hooty's Door" of The Owl House aired where her character Amity enters a relationship with Luz, another female. On August 28, 2024, Whitman would give birth to her son. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Mae Whitman at Movie Tome *Mae Whitman at TV.com Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT people from California
title: Mae Whitman
